# sage-divider

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                               | Type                                                     | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `offset`   | `offset`   |  The offset size follows the t-shirt model xxs: 4px xs: 8px sm: 12px md: 24px lg: 32px xl: 48px xxl: 64px | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm" \| "xl" \| "xs" \| "xxl" \| "xxs"` | `undefined` |
| `vertical` | `vertical` | Sets divider to display vertically                                                                        | `boolean`                                                | `false`     |
